1411540.name: Shell Corp Demo
1411540.description:
Shell Corp is a 1-8 local multiplayer, physics based egg-centric, party game where you control, paint, and crack eggs! Using simple controls and wobbly eggs, play against your friends, or AI, in a series frantic mini-games. Will you take home the Egg Cup?

This demo of the full game features the 8 eggs to paint and 2 game modes, 1 free-for-all and 1 team based, from the full games 7 modes!

  • Fight for survival in the Shell Smash!
  • Poach the fork from your opponent in Hold the Fork!
1411540.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
